text: Jun khan etu khila te bhag loi, taikhan to sob jinis te nijorke rukhabo para laga taiyari kure. Taikhan etu kura to harai jabole mukut9.25 Corith sheher usorte hoi thaka, Isthmian games jita khan ke pine ghas pora bona mukut di thakisele, juntu olop din pichete biya hoijai.  pabole nimite kore, kintu amikhan to ketia bhi naharabole mukut pabo nimite kore.
